item.title: Introversion, Extroversion and the BBC Software Engineer
item.description: Whether you agree with Myers-Briggs personality profiling or not, like fellow BBC’er Ian Forrester I have found them a useful frame of reference from which to discuss my personality, because I see similarities between my perception of me, and the classification. I took the Myers-Briggs personality profiling, and it has labelled me on several occasions an INTP: INTPs are marked by a quiet, stoic, modest, and aloof exterior that masks strong creativity and enthusiasm for novel possibilities.
